esearchresult.querytranslation: ("COVID-19"[MeSH Terms] OR "2019-nCoV"[Title/Abstract] OR "Novel coronavirus"[Title/Abstract] OR "coronavirus disease"[Title/Abstract] OR "coronavirus"[MeSH Terms]) AND ("Glucocorticoids"[MeSH Terms] OR "Steroids"[MeSH Terms] OR "steroid therapy"[Title/Abstract] OR "systemic corticosteroids"[Title/Abstract] OR "corticosteroid treatment"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("Placebos"[MeSH Terms] OR "Comparator groups"[Title/Abstract] OR "Standard care"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("Mortality"[MeSH Terms] OR "Survival"[MeSH Terms] OR "Death rate"[Title/Abstract] OR "Mortality rate"[Title/Abstract] OR "Patient outcomes"[Title/Abstract] OR "Disease progression"[Title/Abstract])
